snippet.title: Dark Escape 4D Arcade
snippet.description:
You play as a nameless character who awakens in a dark, dank dilapitated setting. The only other person with you is a girl who likewise has no idea what's going on. 
A video monitor reveals a man in a face mask who wishes to have a little experiment with the two of you, challenging both to escape from his little game if they can armed with a small supply of weaponry provided. 
However standing in between you and freedom is a army of mutated creatures and traps that will ensure the two of you don't make it out alive.


Gameplay features include five selectable stages, including a Prison(necrophobia stage), Death Chamber(achluophobia stage), Cabin(agoraphobia stage) and a Laboratory(entomophobia stage) plus a final secret stage. 
Enemies feature zombies, insects and vermin as well as other spooky creatures. The goal is escape while reaching a good ending.

To achieve that you need to shoot more cameras possible during the stages, so that to shooting "seeds" during in the final boss battle more easily possible, if you miss one, you get the bad ending and you need to start the game over again.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
